title: Hanes Men's Sweatshirt, Heavyweight Fleece Sweatshirt, Crewneck Pullover for Men
description: ULTIMATE HEAVYWEIGHT - Made from a soft, plush, 9.7-oz. heavyweight fleece for cozy warmth.
THE FIT YOU LOVE - A standard fit with dropped shoulders for a little extra room.
OVER EASY - Classic men's crew sweatshirt never goes out of style.
QUALITY FABRIC - Crafted from cotton-rich knit fleece for complete comfort.
COLD WATER WASH - Hanes recommends washing in cold water to reduce energy usage.

Welcome to the warmth of Hanes® Ultimate® heavyweight sweatshirts for men. Featuring our heaviest fleece, it’s a classic crewneck sweatshirt you'll reach for again and again. Crafted from a cotton-rich 9.7-oz. fleece that maintains its softness, this ultra-versatile men’s pullover sweatshirt is great on its own or layered. You'll love the dropped shoulders that provide extra room for maneuverability and appreciate the extra softness. Need more convincing? These comfortable sweatshirts for men are detailed with ribbed crewneck, cuffs, and hem for classic styling.
